name: Pakistan
interestingFacts: Home to the world's second-highest mountain, K2, and one of the largest producers of mangoes.

name: Japan
interestingFacts: Known for its cherry blossoms, Japan is home to more than 6,800 islands.

name: Brazil
interestingFacts: Holds the title for the largest coffee producer in the world for over 150 years.

name: Norway
interestingFacts: Known for its fjords and as the 'Land of the Midnight Sun,' where the sun never sets in summer.

name: Canada
interestingFacts: Has the longest coastline in the world and over 60% of the world's lakes.

name: Australia
interestingFacts: Home to the Great Barrier Reef and more kangaroos than people.

name: Egypt
interestingFacts: Known for its ancient civilization and iconic pyramids, including the Great Pyramid of Giza.

name: Italy
interestingFacts: Famous for its art, architecture, and cuisine, Italy has more UNESCO World Heritage sites than any other country.
